title: Cheesy rice with asparagus
ingredients: ['1 tbsp melted butter', '2 tbsp dried breadcrumbs', '300 g (10½ oz) long-grain or basmati rice', '600 ml (1 pint) vegetable stock', '150 g (5½ oz) frozen peas', '150 g (5½ oz) asparagus, cut into 5 cm (2 in) pieces', '3 eggs', '100 g (3½ oz) mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '¼ tsp crushed dried chillies', 'salt and pepper']
